DefaultLogOwner__c.inlineHelpText: Specifies the default owner for new Log__c records. This can be a user ID, a username, a queue ID, or a queue's developer name.
DefaultLogOwner__c.label: Log Owner

DefaultLogShareAccessLevel__c.inlineHelpText: Uses Apex managed sharing to grants users read or edit access to their log records (on insert only). When no access level is specified, no Apex sharing logic is executed. This only gives record-level access - users will still need to be granted access to the Log__c object using permission sets or profiles.
DefaultLogShareAccessLevel__c.label: Log Access Level

DefaultNumberOfDaysToRetainLogs__c.inlineHelpText: This value is used to set the field Log__c.LogRetentionDate__c,  which is then used by LogBatchPurger to delete old logs. To keep  logs indefinitely, set this field to blank (null).
DefaultNumberOfDaysToRetainLogs__c.label: Days to Retain Logs

DefaultSaveMethod__c.inlineHelpText: Defaults to EVENT_BUS. This controls the default save method used by Logger when calling saveLog(). In most situations, EVENT_BUS should be used.
DefaultSaveMethod__c.label: Save Method

IsAnonymousModeEnabled__c.inlineHelpText: When enabled, any logs generated will not have any user-specific details set - any fields related to the User, Profile, etc. will be null. Note: this feature only works properly when using the save method EVENT_BUS.
IsAnonymousModeEnabled__c.label: Enable Anonymous Mode

IsApexSystemDebugLoggingEnabled__c.inlineHelpText: When enabled, Logger will automatically call Apex's System.debug(). To help with performance, this option should be disabled in production unless you are actively troubleshooting an issue.
IsApexSystemDebugLoggingEnabled__c.label: Enable Apex System.debug()

IsDataMaskingEnabled__c.inlineHelpText: When enabled, any data-mask rules (configured in LogEntryDataMaskRule__mdt) will be automatically applied to log entry messages.
IsDataMaskingEnabled__c.label: Enable Data Masking

IsEnabled__c.inlineHelpText: Controls if Logger is enabled for the specified level (organization, profile, or user)
IsEnabled__c.label: Enabled

IsJavaScriptConsoleLoggingEnabled__c.inlineHelpText: When enabled, Logger will automatically call the browser's console.log() function when logging via lightning components. To help with performance, this option should be disabled in production unless you are actively troubleshooting an issue.
IsJavaScriptConsoleLoggingEnabled__c.label: Enable JavaScript console.log()

IsPlatformEventStorageEnabled__c.inlineHelpText: Controls if LogEntryEvent__e platform events are transformed & stored in the custom objects Log__c and LogEntry__c (when IsSavingEnabled__c == true).
IsPlatformEventStorageEnabled__c.label: Store Platform Events

IsRecordFieldStrippingEnabled__c.inlineHelpText: When enabled, any time an SObject record is logged, only fields that the current user can access will be included in the record's JSON.
IsRecordFieldStrippingEnabled__c.label: Strip Inaccessible Record Fields

IsSavingEnabled__c.inlineHelpText: Controls if saving is enabled - when disabled, any calls to saveLog() are ignored.
IsSavingEnabled__c.label: Enable Saving

DefaultLogScenario__c.inlineHelpText: Sets a default scenario for the transaction
DefaultLogScenario__c.label: Log Scenario
